EmailTemplate.description: The email response to someone filling out the bill rate calculator. Garrett Zaino 4/12/2012
EmailTemplate.name: Bill Rate Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners' Bill Rate Articles Request Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
Thank you for requesting our 20-page educational package on bill rate strategies.
Hereâ€™s a link to these articles, with topics including the cost-based method, the market-based method and the value-based method. We also encourage you to take a deeper dive into the cost-based method by using our bill rate calculator <#>.
Did you know that one of our Consultant Services Advisors can provide you a customized cash flow estimate showing you how taxes, expenses, and benefit deductions affect your net pay? You can call us Monday through Friday from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. ET at 1-800-220-0469, or simply reply to this email and we will contact you.
Best regards,
The Consultant Services Team Phone: 1-800-220-0469 Read about the CSA team, http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/get-know-few-mbo-consultant-services-advisors.
MBO Partners www.mbopartners.com
